If you look at each chapter closely, you will see that each chapter came out cronologically!
First the kid finds out about the affair and gets his moms attention with it!
Second the kid gets his mom to cut ties with the chad but she secretly continues the affair!
Third the kid finds out everything his mom and the chad have been doing behind his back with the pictures and the videos!
Fourth...this one.
Kid takes the initiative and gets his mother back!

Now this is good conclusion(?) to this NTR. The bull becomes the cucked and the son (maybe) reclaimed the mother. if the author is a sadist, the ending might turn out like netosis but if the author is sane, the son will now get femdommed by the mother. Although i am not that opposed to the netosis ending, this NTR is gold and I don't want to see it become like the hundreds of others that go like "the son cannot let go of mum so he becomes the bull's bitch" or something like that. the art is one of the best in recent NTR and I really don't want to se it go to waste.
The story continued from summer (June to August) to autumn (September to November), then winter (December to February) and spring (March to May), then summer once again.

Cont:
The “third chapter start in july 1 year after the first chapter.” Her mother got him a phone and put paternal watch on basically everything so the kid wouldn't find out that she was still seeing him because horny? recorded everything and put it on porn sites. The kid though found a way to breach that and found out she was still meeting with him even though she said she cut ties with him in September. His imagination then went wild because they were even doing it in their home and he seen it like it had happened right beside him. Then the kid hid in her mothers room when they were doing it and it ended with the mother admitting that she didn't want him finding out that she was still seeing him and even did it in their house when he wasn't at home. The kid than basically accepts that he can't do anything about all of this and that “summer came again.” Thus leading to today’s release of part 4. Not confusing at all right?
